title: 你们到一个新服务器第一件事都是干什么呢
author: Cheris
txt_content: 如题，你们会干什么呢，盖房子？偷东西awa？

replies.author: 屑-帽-快-爬
replies.txt_content: 砍树

replies.author: 星龙醉梦
replies.txt_content: /register 密码 重复密码

replies.author: Cheris
replies.txt_content:
奇怪的帽子 发表于 2020-7-15 16:52
砍树
几天不见，换头像了？awa

replies.author: lianqiuchen
replies.txt_content: 先看看 服务器的规则然后看看有啥插件

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 应该先发一个，大家好

replies.author: 欧巴桑m
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Jimarym
replies.txt_content: 砍树啊想致富先砍树

replies.author: 屑-帽-快-爬
replies.txt_content:
Cheris 发表于 2020-7-15 16:52
几天不见，换头像了？awa
是啊

replies.author: BlackCF
replies.txt_content: 砍树是第一要务

replies.author: 时陨念
replies.txt_content: 想致富，先撸树

replies.author: 玄冥不倒翁
replies.txt_content:
星龙醉梦 发表于 2020-7-15 16:52
/register 密码 重复密码
不是按 / 吗，捂嘴笑

replies.author: 君忆
replies.txt_content: 先看看商店平衡不，再看看氪金力度强不

replies.author: xiaojiajiawww
replies.txt_content: 偷东西awa

replies.author: uisi_xxh1
replies.txt_content: 看看服务器的氪金商店，有没有我喜欢的武器

replies.author: asdadsadad
replies.txt_content: 先观察地形 然后发展服务器

replies.author: Moming17
replies.txt_content: 看充值选项，然后默默的砍树挖矿

replies.author: qianxiaoxia
replies.txt_content: 先看看风气好不好，然后去挖矿

replies.author: liurunzell
replies.txt_content: 先注册 然后看菜单

replies.author: FireDancer
replies.txt_content: 要想富，先撸树，亘古不变的原则

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content:
淦！
我不玩服务器

replies.author: AsHolKni
replies.txt_content: ……做房子

replies.author: chw99szh
replies.txt_content: 做任务，盖房子。

replies.author: DemooQAQ
replies.txt_content: /register 密码 重复密码

replies.author: Minecraft.Wnxi
replies.txt_content:
uisi_xxh1 发表于 2020-7-15 17:25
看看服务器的氪金商店，有没有我喜欢的武器
啊，这有钱人。

replies.author: 荧光谷主
replies.txt_content: 看服务器各大系统怎么样, 看有没有什么特别变态的东西
